title: Knowledge Base Management
subtitle: Manage and query knowledge base contents

create.title: Create Knowledge Base
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the purpose of this knowledge base...
create.tips: Tip: Once you select an embedding model, do not modify the model or vector dimensions, as this will severely affect recall rate.

delete.title: Delete Knowledge Base
delete.confirmText: Are you sure you want to delete knowledge base '{name}'?
delete.warning: This action is irreversible. All documents, chunks, and associated configurations will be permanently deleted.
